resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81677</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81677</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4290</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Construction of a G-clamp</string>
            <string language="es">Construcción de un agarre G</string>
            <string language="ga">Teanntán G a Thógáil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau einer G-Klemmplatte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction d'une G-bride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construção de uma G-braçadeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costruzione di un G-morsetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή ενός γ-σφιγκτήρα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions and measurements for the construction of a G-clamp, a useful tool for holding parts together for drilling, welding, pop riveting, sanding and marking out.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones y medidas para la construcción de un agarre G, una herramienta útil para sujetar piezas, perforación, soldadura, enroscado, lijamiento e impresión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha agus tomhaiseanna chun teanntán G a thógáil, uirlis úsáideach chun páirteanna a choinneáil le chéile le haghaidh druileála, táthaithe, seamaithe, greanála agus marcála amach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Engineering</string>
            <string language="es">Ingeniería. Proyecto</string>
            <string language="ga">Innealtóireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Project</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen und Messen für den Aufbau einer 
G-Klemmplatte, ein nützliches Hilfsmittel für das Anhalten zerteilt 
zusammen für die Bohrung, das Schweissen, Knall heraus befestigend, 
versandend und kennzeichnend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les instructions et les mesures pour la 
construction d'une G-bride, un outil utile pour se tenir pièce 
ensemble pour le forage, la soudure, le bruit rivetant, ponçant et 
marquant dehors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As instruções e as medidas para a construção 
de uma G-braçadeira, uma ferramenta útil para prender peça junto 
para perfurar, soldar, PNF rebitando, lixando e marcando para fora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le istruzioni e le misure per la costruzione di 
un G-morsetto, uno strumento utile per la tenuta parte insieme 
per perforare, la saldatura, lo schiocco rivettanti, smeriglianti e 
contrassegnanti fuori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες και μετρήσεις για την κατασκευή ενός 
γ-σφιγκτήρα, ένα χρήσιμο εργαλείο για τα μέρη μαζί για τη 
διάτρηση, την ένωση, το λαϊκό κάρφωμα, να στρώσει με άμμο και 
να χαρακτηρίσει έξω.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ingénierie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Engenharia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ingegneria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμοσμένη μηχανική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
